attributes.action: Make Cotswold Roads Safer Regardless To Budgets
attributes.additional_details: There are a massive number of accidents and fatalities on our country roads and the ones i am fighting to make safer are the A40 London to Oxford roads and the A436 Roads. none of these roads have any safety put in place and this time and is resulting in loss of life ... so please sign my petition and show the Mp and the transport minister to help us

rejection.details: Responsibility for safety on the A40 and A436 rests with the local authorities which own them (Gloucestershire and Oxfordshire County Councils, in the main).
